document_data.caption: A map showing the Street of Silks and surroundings in the Castle Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: The Street of Silks
document_data.locations: Locations on the Street of Silks
document_data.mainbody: The '''Street of Silks''' was a major road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: The Street of Silks spanned much of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Castle Ward|Castle Ward]]. It ran north to south, running parallel with the [[Swords Streets]] to the west and [[Street of Silver]] to the east. The street originated in the north on [[Bazaar Street]] where it branched south to end on [[Waterdeep Way]] at [[Ahghairon's Tower]] and the [[Palace of Waterdeep]]. Other roads connecting with the Street of Silks along its path included [[Keltarn Street]], [[Selduth Street]], [[Shadow Alley]], [[Tharleon Street]], and [[Sevenlamps Cut]].
document_data.Notable Locations:
* Ahghairon's Tower
* [[Curious Past]]
* The Palace of Waterdeep
* The [[Dragon's Head]] tavern
